allow: Bash(powershell -Command "try { Add-Type -AssemblyName System.IO.Compression.FileSystem; [System.IO.Compression.ZipFile]::ExtractToDirectory(''C:\Users\user\Music\Projects\warranty\1.docx'', ''C:\Users\user\Music\Projects\warranty\temp_docx''); Get-Content ''C:\Users\user\Music\Projects\warranty\temp_docx\word\document.xml'' -Raw } catch { Write-Error $_Exception.Message }")
